channel.title: Maverick on 小城故事多

item.title: Overview of Maverick
item.description: Overview Maverick is a static blog generator built with python. Like Hexo and Jekyll, it takes Markdown(.md) files as input, and output beautifully formated and well structured website pages(.html). It has a lot built-in useful features(feed, search, sitemap, etc.), with extended Markdown syntax and enhanced image processing pipeline. If you are tired of intricate plugins and complicated configurations, just give Maverick a try. You focus on writing, let Maverick take care of the rest.
